name: Great Mountain Experience
description: " The Great Mountain Experience." allows you to experience a new kind of tour. You can enjoy beautiful scenery with VR gear at your home. Distinctive ways to enjoy beautiful scenery await you, so we hope you will enjoy the ride. Bon voyage!
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOW 10 Processor: I 3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX950 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WINDOW 10 Processor: i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
